text: Claude Miller (20 February 1942 – 4 April 2012)Le cinéaste Claude Miller est mort mercredi soir, Le Point, le 5 avril 2012 was a French movie director, producer and screenwriter. He was inspired by François Truffaut. He was known for directing La meilleure façon de marcher, Les Mistons (1957) and The 400 Blows (1959). ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Movie directors from Paris Category:Movie producers from Paris Category:Writers from Paris Category:French screenwriters
title: Claude Miller
